Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Heart scarab
Description: Well-made heart scarab of green-coloured stone. The bezel shows marks of an inscription. Since only some traces of the signs at the extreme ends and the horizontal stripes which separated the lines of the inscription can be distinguished, the inscription is now completely illegible. It is impossible to recognize the proprietor's name.
